sentences.en: A huge snowdrift is blocking the entrance to the driveway.
sentences.cn: 大雪堆阻塞了汽车专用道的入口.

sentences.en: Bunny and Susan went out to shovel the little Bunny out of the snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 巴尼和苏珊拿了雪铲,推着小车,要把小小兔儿铲出雪堆.

sentences.en: Eventually, It'succumbed to the elements and was buried under years of snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 最终, 因恶劣环境难逃劫难,被多年积雪覆灭.

sentences.en: No sense fretting about taking down the 5-foot Christmas tree buried in a snowdrift on her deck in Brookfield, Conn.
sentences.cn: 当她从位于康涅狄格州布鲁克菲尔德的自家平台上拆下埋在雪里的5英尺高圣诞树时也不用烦恼了。

sentences.en: On a bright winter's day spread a sheet of any black material across a snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 在明朗的冬天,往雪堆上播散一片黑色的物质.

sentences.en: The dad - blamed car got stuck in a snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 该死的汽车陷在雪堆里了.

sentences.en: The train ran into a snowdrift.
They went to the window and saw a very little Bunny stuck fast in a snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 他们来到窗前一看,看见一只小小兔结结实实陷在了雪堆里.

sentences.en: This snow had decided to go on falling until everything was a single, vast wet snowdrift, and nobody would remember what had been underneath it.
sentences.cn: 雪决定继续下，下到所有的东西都变成一个孤零零的，巨大湿雪堆，没有人能记得下面曾是什么。

sentences.en: Two huge , hairy ears stuck up above the snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 一对偌大的, 毛茸茸的耳朵竖起在雪堆上.

sentences.en: Weller was once a stranded motorist himself. Driving in an Illinois blizzard when he was 16, he got stuck in a snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 韦勒自己曾经也是一个无助驾驶员，在他16岁的时候驾驶在伊利诺斯州的暴风雪中，陷入了雪堆。

trans.tran_en: a deep mass of snow formed by the wind
